ea8e1369-7b8a-4448-a33b-465c0c306263.description: This badge earner is a member of the Victorian Chamber. badge_template_activities.title: To qualify for a Victorian Chamber membership you must be involved in a business or be a business professional. Members must pay a yearly membership fee.
Potential new members can select from a range of membership types designed for every business stage.

They can plan and manage resource acquisition and monitor and review operational performance recognising and correcting under-performance, and identifying and deploying measures for increasing efficiency and eliminating resource inefficiencies and waste.
014b1d18-d6e5-438a-8657-75cceafc6509.name: Manage Business Operational Plans

issuer.summary: issued by Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

entity.name: Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

e92b9c26-2758-4c57-aaab-69a3f6c79e3a.description: Participants of this credential have an increased knowledge of the Privacy Act and what information it protects. They understand the 13 Australian Privacy Principles – the 13 “rules” for privacy compliance in Australia and the exceptions to compliance with the act as well as how the European Unions General Data Protection Regulation or “GDPR” might apply to their business and practical tips to ensure their business can comply.
e92b9c26-2758-4c57-aaab-69a3f6c79e3a.name: Privacy for Business

issuer.summary: issued by Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

entity.name: Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

f6332f56-35f1-432b-b5f5-e3c819cd32a2.description: Participants of this credential have the skills and knowledge required to lead and manage effective workplace relationships, with particular regard to communication and representation, as critical premises for the success of any organisation and its leaders. They can manage ideas and information, establish systems to develop trust and confidence and manage the development and maintenance of networks and relationships. Particpants can manage difficulties to achieve positive outcomes.
f6332f56-35f1-432b-b5f5-e3c819cd32a2.name: Lead and Manage Effective Workplace Relationships

issuer.summary: issued by Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

entity.name: Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

9e5f3b95-334d-44a1-a7bf-14fc8e22a298.description: Participants of this credential understand the core competencies for eliciting innovative behaviours. They are able to embed creativity-generating mechanisms into every policy and procedure: incentive systems, meeting formats, evaluations, goal structuring and office design. Participants can apply a toolbox of divergent thinking techniques and other mechanisms to create conducive environments. They understand and identify barriers to innovation and can utilise various ice-breakers.
9e5f3b95-334d-44a1-a7bf-14fc8e22a298.name: Leading Teams for Innovation

issuer.summary: issued by Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

entity.name: Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

fc74096c-a468-449f-93e4-2214c0b2fae9.description: Participants of this credential are able to develop a schedule of work in Microsoft Project. They are able to establish a work breakdown structure, link tasks, assign resources and apply a budget to the project.
fc74096c-a468-449f-93e4-2214c0b2fae9.name: Microsoft Project Introduction

issuer.summary: issued by Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

entity.name: Victorian Chamber of Commerce and Industry
